Package org.red5.codec

Class VP8Video

java.lang.Object
org.red5.codec.AbstractVideo
org.red5.codec.VP8Video
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVideoStreamCodec
Direct Known Subclasses:
VP9Video
public class VP8Video extends AbstractVideo
Red5 video codec for the VP8 video format.
Author:
The Red5 Project, Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)

      Specified by:

    • addData

      public boolean addData(org.apache.mina.core.buffer.IoBuffer data, int timestamp)
      Update the state of the codec with the passed data.
      Specified by:
      addData in interface IVideoStreamCodec
      Overrides:
      addData in class AbstractVideo
      Parameters:
      data - data to tell the codec we're adding
      timestamp - time associated with the data
      Returns:
      true for success. false for passing wrong video format or other error.

    • addData

      public boolean addData(org.apache.mina.core.buffer.IoBuffer data, int timestamp, boolean amf)
      Add video data with a time stamp and a flag identifying the content as AMF or not.
      Specified by:
      addData in interface IVideoStreamCodec
      Overrides:
      addData in class AbstractVideo
      Parameters:
      data - a IoBuffer object
      timestamp - a int
      amf - if true, data is in AMF format otherwise its most likely from non-AMF source like RTP
      Returns:
      true if data is added and false otherwise

    • getDesciptorSize

      public static int getDesciptorSize(byte[] input, int offset, int length)
      The size in bytes of the payload descriptor at offset in input. The size is between 1 and 6.
      Parameters:
      input - input
      offset - offset
      length - length
      Returns:
      The size in bytes of the payload descriptor at offset in input, or -1 if the input is not valid
